biotools.summary: Java GUI that enables the user to graphically call differentially expressed genes. For read mapping it relies on bowtie and for the differntial expression analysis it builds on an R backbone running DESeq and edgeR.

bioschemas.name: RobiNA
bioschemas.summary: Java GUI that enables the user to graphically call differentially expressed genes. For read mapping it relies on bowtie and for the differntial expression analysis it builds on an R backbone running DESeq and edgeR.
